import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"api_auth_login_create"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/auth/login/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Check the credentials and return the REST Token
if the credentials are valid and authenticated.
Calls Django Auth login method to register User ID
in Django session framework

Accept the following POST parameters: username, password
Return the REST Framework Token Object's key.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"username":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"password":{"type":"string"}},"required":["password"],"title":"Login"}},"application/x-www-form-urlencoded":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"username":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"password":{"type":"string"}},"required":["password"],"title":"Login"}},"multipart/form-data":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"username":{"type":"string"},"email":{"type":"string","format":"email"},"password":{"type":"string"}},"required":["password"],"title":"Login"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Serializer for Token model.","properties":{"key":{"type":"string","maxLength":40}},"required":["key"],"title":"Token"}}},"description":""}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
